ValidationRule.description: Ensures that approved name changes must be open or move to complete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && RecordType.DeveloperName = "PersonalInformationChange" && ISPICKVAL(Type, "Name change") && ISPICKVAL( ChangeApprovalStatus__c, "Approved") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "In progress") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "On hold") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Complete"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Approved name changes can only be open or move to complete. They cannot be cancelled.
